messages.title: At a time when people are struggling to find affordable housing, to access NHS health care and public services - we desperately need a Labour government.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: NHS MENTAL HEALTH CARE IN NORTH NORFOLK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in the NHS and make sure mental health services meet the necessary standards. Aim to provide services that keep people safe and rebuild lives.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: GIVING PEOPLE THE FINAL SAY ON BREXIT
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will give the people the Final Say on Brexit, uniting people in North Norfolk.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A GREEN NEW DEAL FOR NORTH NORFOLK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's plan focuses on dealing with the climate crisis and North Norfolk's rural communities. This involves sustainable council and social housing, rejuvenating town centres.

issues.brexitEurope: Leaving the EU has not been possible with politicians unable to agree the best way forward.
issues.environment: Labour's plan includes urgent action needed to tackle the climate crisis and sustainable council and social housing.
issues.health: Invest in social care and much needed mental health services. Investment in NHS and ensuring services meet the necessary standards.

community.content: Emma has persistently campaigned for these issues and supports...

leaflet.personalStatement: If you elect a Labour MP in North Norfolk you will get someone who stands up for public services. Labour will invest in the NHS, provide mental health services, and give people the final say on Brexit to unite our community.

endorsements.endorsement: I lent my vote to Norman Lamb and the candidate he was supporting. Emma has persistently campaigned for these issues and supports everything Labour offers.
Emma has persistently campaigned for these issues. She has resource and far sight; needs to be effective in her role to support and advocate for North Norfolk residents.

examples: During the last 9 years mental health services in our community have been cut.
If you elect a Labour MP in North Norfolk you will get someone who stands up for public services.
Labour will invest in the NHS, provide mental health services, and give people the final say on Brexit to unite our community.
Labour's plan includes refurbishing social housing and rejuvenating town centres.
Labour MP in North Norfolk who stands up for public services.
Labour will give the people the Final Say on Brexit, uniting people in North Norfolk.
Labour will invest in the NHS and is committed to tackling the climate crisis.
Labour's Green New Deal focuses on dealing with the climate crisis and rural communities support.

personalStories.story: In 2017 I lent my vote to Norman Lamb and the candidate he was supporting.

examples: Emma has persistently campaigned for these issues and supports everything Labour offers.
She has resource and far sight; needs to be effective in her role to support and advocate for North Norfolk residents.
Leaving the EU has not been possible with politicians unable to agree the best way forward.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Our future depends on dealing with the climate crisis and North Norfolk's rural communities support.

examples: Labour MP in North Norfolk who stands up for public services.
